Bookmarker is a free tool that lets you bookmark webpages and use them productively in the instant you need without leaving the tab. 

To get started, install the extension. Once installed you can click the extension icon to see different buttons which help you to add, delete, import and export bookmarks listed in the bookmarker extension.

You can open the bookmarked sites right in the current tab just by clicking on the bookmark and to open them in a new tab click the arrow icon on the extreme right side of the bookmark title.

ğ—™ğ—²ğ—®ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—²ğ˜€:
1. Add bookmark
2. Delete bookmark(s)
3. Export bookmarks
4. Import bookmarks
5. Change the bookmark preview window size

ğŸ­. ğ—”ğ—±ğ—± ğ—¯ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ğ—ºğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¸
Visit any webpage which you want to bookmark and then click the  '+' button in the extension popup, the bookmark of that webpage gets added to the bookmarks list. 

ğŸ®. ğ——ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—²ğ˜ğ—² ğ—¯ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ğ—ºğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¸(ğ˜€)
Select(check) the bookmark(s) which you want from the list of bookmarks and then click the red colored delete button. 

ğŸ¯. ğ—˜ğ˜…ğ—½ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ˜ ğ—¯ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ğ—ºğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¸ğ˜€
To export the bookmarks click the button in turquoise color that has an arrow pointing outwards and then select the location to save the .json file. 

ğŸ°. ğ—œğ—ºğ—½ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ˜ ğ—¯ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ğ—ºğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¸ğ˜€
If you have a .json file with exported bookmarks then click the green color button that has an arrow inwards and select the .json file and all your bookmarks get imported. 

ğŸ±. ğ—–ğ—µğ—®ğ—»ğ—´ğ—² ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—¯ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ğ—ºğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¸ ğ—½ğ—¿ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—²ğ˜„ ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—±ğ—¼ğ˜„ ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ˜‡ğ—²
Right click the extension icon and select 'Extension options' and it will open a page where you can update the width and height of the bookmark preview popup window. Once done, click the save button. 

If you want to share any suggestions or feedback, click 'Contact the publisher' link in the sidebar of chrome extension page and send the mail.

If you liked this extension you can support me by buying a coffee. This helps to keep updating and developing more such interesting tools.
